00045 #include <avr32/io.h>
00046 #include "compiler.h"
00047 #include "adc.h"
00048 
00049 
00050 void adc_configure(volatile avr32_adc_t * adc)
00051 {
00052   Assert( adc!=NULL );
00053 
00054 #ifdef USE_ADC_8_BITS
00055   adc->mr |= 1<<AVR32_ADC_LOWRES_OFFSET;
00056 #endif
00057   // set Sample/Hold time to max so that the ADC capacitor should be loaded entirely
00058   adc->mr |= 0xF << AVR32_ADC_SHTIM_OFFSET;
00059   // set Startup to max so that the ADC capacitor should be loaded entirely
00060   adc->mr |= 0x1F << AVR32_ADC_STARTUP_OFFSET;
00061 }
00062 
00063 void adc_start(volatile avr32_adc_t * adc)
00064 {
00065   Assert( adc!=NULL );
00066 
00067   // start conversion
00068   adc->cr = AVR32_ADC_START_MASK;
00069 }
00070 
00071 void adc_enable(volatile avr32_adc_t * adc, unsigned short channel)
00072 {
00073   Assert( adc!=NULL );
00074   Assert( channel <= AVR32_ADC_ADC_CHANNELS_MSB );  // check if channel exist
00075 
00076   // enable channel
00077   adc->cher = (1 << channel);
00078 }
00079 
00080 void adc_disable(volatile avr32_adc_t * adc, unsigned short channel)
00081 {
00082   Assert( adc!=NULL );
00083   Assert( channel <= AVR32_ADC_ADC_CHANNELS_MSB ); // check if channel exist
00084 
00085   if (adc_get_status(adc, channel) == ENABLED)
00086   {
00087     // disable channel
00088     adc->chdr |= (1 << channel);
00089   }
00090 }
00091 
00092 Bool adc_get_status(volatile avr32_adc_t * adc, unsigned short channel)
00093 {
00094   Assert( adc!=NULL );
00095   Assert( channel <= AVR32_ADC_ADC_CHANNELS_MSB );  // check if channel exist
00096 
00097   return ((adc->chsr & (1 << channel)) ? ENABLED : DISABLED);
00098 }
00099 
00100 Bool adc_check_eoc(volatile avr32_adc_t * adc, unsigned short channel)
00101 {
00102   Assert( adc!=NULL );
00103   Assert( channel <= AVR32_ADC_ADC_CHANNELS_MSB );  // check if channel exist
00104 
00105   // get SR register : EOC bit for channel
00106   return ((adc->sr & (1 << channel)) ? HIGH : LOW);
00107 }
00108 
00109 Bool adc_check_ovr(volatile avr32_adc_t * adc, unsigned short channel)
00110 {
00111   Assert( adc!=NULL );
00112   Assert( channel <= AVR32_ADC_ADC_CHANNELS_MSB );  // check if channel exist
00113 
00114   // get SR register : OVR bit for channel
00115   return ((adc->sr & (1 << (channel + 8))) ? FAIL : PASS);
00116 }
00117 
00118 unsigned long adc_get_value(volatile avr32_adc_t * adc, unsigned short channel)
00119 {
00120   Assert( adc!=NULL );
00121   Assert( channel <= AVR32_ADC_ADC_CHANNELS_MSB );  // check if channel exist
00122 
00123   // wait for end of conversion
00124   while(adc_check_eoc(adc, channel) != HIGH);
00125   return *((unsigned long * )((&(adc->cdr0)) + channel));
00126 }
